snippet: Sixteen people were arrested Thursday after staging a sit-in at a Baltimore City Hall hearing to consider a new police commissioner.
abstract: Sixteen demonstrators staging sit-in in Baltimore's City Hall to protest permanent appointment of interim Police Commissioner Kevin Davis are arrested.
lead_paragraph: Sixteen people were arrested Thursday after staging a sit-in at a Baltimore City Hall hearing to consider a new police commissioner.

headline.main: Maryland: 16 Protesters Arrested After Baltimore City Hall Sit-In
headline.print_headline: Maryland: 16 Protesters Arrested After Baltimore City Hall Sit-In
